Name: AmazingWorldOfFengXuan
Desc:
这是一个模组的官方示范，它示范了模组可以提供的大部分功能。[color=#FF0000]非开发者请勿激活[/color]
模组相关的文档等内容请查看游戏安装目录下Mods文件夹
模组开发者官方支持QQ群：806689706（仅限开发者,玩家请前往各大玩家群）
This is an official example of mod, which contains most function.[color=#FF0000]DO NOT ACTIVATE THIS IF YOU ARE NOT A DEVELOPER.[/color]
 To check more instructions of mods, you can go to the Mods folder under where the game is installed.
UIPackage说明: 载入UI模块，多个包用逗号隔开，没有就删掉UIPackage
Author: GSQ
IncreasedDesc:
该演示模组位于安装目录Mods文件夹。
This mod locates in the Mods folder under where you install this game.
